summary: Email correspondence between FBI Special Agent and Jessica-Wind Abolafia regarding draft documents (I-914 Supplement B and a letter) for a victim in an investigation, discussing dates of victimization (approximately 2003-2018). The communication involves coordination between law enforcement and a non-profit anti-trafficking organization.

persons.name: Jessica-Wind Abolafia
persons.role: Director, Anti-Trafficking Initiative at Sanctuary for Families
persons.context: Correspondent from Sanctuary for Families sending draft documents (I-914 Supplement B and a presence letter) for review and signature related to a victim investigation.

persons.name: Erica
persons.context: Mentioned as being available to join a call with Jessica-Wind Abolafia to discuss the draft documents.

persons.name: Jessica
persons.role: Special Agent, FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: FBI Special Agent from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk following up on draft documents and providing dates of victimization (approx. 2003-2018).

connections.description: Collaborating on draft legal documents (I-914 Supplement B and a letter) for a victim in an investigation, with email correspondence and offers to discuss by phone.
Colleagues at Sanctuary for Families' Anti-Trafficking Initiative, both available to join a call regarding the draft documents.

events.title: Period of Victimization
events.description: Approximate dates of victimization for an individual referenced in the draft I-914 Supplement B document.

events.title: Draft Documents Sent
events.description: Jessica-Wind Abolafia sends draft documents (I-914 Supplement B and a presence letter) to FBI for review and signature.

events.title: Follow-up on Victimization Dates
events.description: FBI Special Agent Jessica follows up on the draft documents, specifying the dates of victimization as approximately 2003-2018.

keyFacts: The document is a 2022 email thread regarding draft legal documents (I-914 Supplement B and a letter) for a victim in an investigation.
Dates of victimization for the individual are specified as approximately 2003 to 2018, a 15-year period.
Communication is between an FBI Special Agent from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk and the Director of the Anti-Trafficking Initiative at Sanctuary for Families.
The correspondence indicates ongoing collaboration between law enforcement and a non-profit organization supporting gender violence survivors in a trafficking-related case.
